channel.title: Model error
channel.description:
ok no one is even trying to help me in the client help section and i was also wonder is this server side or client side im getting an error when spawning one of my new items.... here is the error
thi si in run.bat of the client.
[code]connecting to 5starmodZ no midi or mp3 files in folder connected to 5starmodZ loading custom spirts part 1 loading custom spirts part 2 headicons_prayer 6.png Skulls Loaded Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15414 at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:125) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:8588) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:8409) at client.method105(client.java:9805) at client.method36(client.java:2146) at client.method102(client.java:9250) at client.method9(client.java:10419) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:127) at client.run(client.java:5380) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code]

item.title: Model error
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

I understand you do not get much help… however do not create multiple topics (It just makes the forum look messy)

There does need to be more activity in this section because I have noticed there are several topics that do not get a single reply to while in the Server Help section there are too many replys!
We need you!

Read full topic

item.title: Model error
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

you probably made the item ID too high (the range has to be somewhere between 8000 to 12000 or thereabouts). search forums for the “Biggest Tutorial on Moparscape” (it’s about model editing). on that page, it will tell you how to add custom items into your client.

good luck.

Read full topic
